QueryViewSpec.Name: RGL Data Only Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: RGL Data Only-No commitments or sponsorships
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: SELECT rgl.SPONSORID as ID, sponsor.LOOKUPID as SPONSORID, sponsor.[NAME] as SPONSORNAME, rgl.STARTDATE, rgl.ENDDATE, (case when ENDDATE is null then DATEDIFF(m, STARTDATE, GETDATE()) when ENDDATE is not null then DATEDIFF(m, STARTDATE, ENDDATE) end) as SPONSORSHIPMONTHS, rgl.[TYPE] as RGLTYPE, SOURCE, SOURCECATEGORY, PACKAGE, INBOUNDCHANNEL, CONVERSIONDATE, DAYSTOCONVERT, rgl.STATUS, case when CANCELSPONSORSHIPREASONID is null then '' else (select REASON from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where ID = CANCELSPONSORSHIPREASONID) end as CANCELREASON, case when rgl.FINANCIALSPONSORID is null then '' else (select NAME from dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME(rgl.FINANCIALSPONSORID)) end as FINANCIALSPONSORNAME, (select LOOKUPID from dbo.CONSTITUENT where ID = rgl.FINANCIALSPONSORID) as FINANCIALSPONSORID, ISACCOUNTCORRECTION, (select LOOKUPID from dbo.REVENUE where ID = rgl.RECURRINGGIFTID) as REVENUELOOKUPID, coalesce((select sum(RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY.AMOUNT) from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY where SOURCEREVENUEID = RECURRINGGIFTID and TYPECODE = 0), 0) as TOTALPAIDAMOUNT FROM dbo.USR_COMMITMENTLINE_RECURRINGGIFT rgl join dbo.CONSTITUENT sponsor on sponsor.ID = SPONSORID inner join revenue r on r.id = rgl.recurringgiftid
